name: Loader
description: Loader is an exciting puzzle game where you place loads on platforms to pass levels.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: 128 MB or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 or later Processor: Dual Core 3.0+ GHz or higher Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 320 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
